Articles.Content:
I have been playing the basic version of KSP with Mechjeb, FASA, and KW Rocketry mods only until the KSP V1.9 came out. It was about the minimum you need to do anything.

Well I have since gone to V1.0 with a few mods. Now I have a contract with ore in it. I found a drill but where do you store it?

Thanks for the any help.

Robert
